Form.UsernameHint: Create a username between 3 and 20 characters long, containing only letters, numbers, and underscores.
Form.PasswordHint: Create a password at least 8 characters long, containing at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.

NotFound.Title: Study Not Found
NotFound.Description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

NotFound.Title: Page Not Found
NotFound.Description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

Navigation.Progress: You have completed {percent}% of the interview

General.Name: General Interview Information
General.Description: Help with the general interview process, including how to navigate the interview, and general tips to help you get started.

Welcome.Title: Welcome to the interview
Welcome.Text: Before you begin, here are some general tips to help you navigate the interview process.

NavigationBar.Title: Navigation Bar
NavigationBar.Text: The navigation bar helps you move through the interview process, and get help if you need it.

InterviewMovement.Title: Navigating the Interview
InterviewMovement.Text: This is the third step of the interview. Here you will be introduced to the interview process and given an overview of what to expect.

Summary.Title: Summary
Summary.Text: Use the back and forward buttons to move through the interview, and track your progress using the progress bar.

NameGenerator.Name: Name Generator Help
NameGenerator.Description: Help with the current task, including how to add new people, how to delete people, and how to edit people.

Welcome.Title: Welcome to the Name Generator
Welcome.Text: This is the name generator interface. This interface allows you to nominate people. First, read the prompt and think about the people who meet the criteria.

Prompts.Title: Prompts
Prompts.Text: These are the prompts. They help you think about the people you want to nominate.

SidePanels.Title: Side Panels
SidePanels.Text: These are side panels. They show the people you have already mentioned. You can drag and drop a person into the main area to nominate them.

AddPerson.Title: Adding a person
AddPerson.Text: Click this button to add a new person

ContextualHelp.Title: Help
ContextualHelp.Description: The cards below show the help options available based on the current page. Click on a card to view the help content.

ContactCard.Title: Contact the study organiser
ContactCard.Description: Click here if you would like to contact the organiser of this study.
